text:
In our project, we use test log files (.jtl files) to generate a number of 
detailed reports in which we would also like to embed some information kept in 
the test plan definitions themselves (i.e. the .jmx files).
For this purpose, we need to have a link between these two types of files. 
Currently, the only (?) such link is provided via the "testname" resp. the "lb" 
attributes, but this is rather weak as it breaks when the test element names 
are not unique (which happens occasionally in our test plans).

My suggestion out of this would be to assign a unique ID to each test element 
(for instance a simple auto-incrementing integer) which is stored in the test 
plan file and which can be written out into the .jtl file (via a new setting in 
the jmeter.properties file).
